Japanese: ドレイヴン卿が出現時にこの血液を飲み干し、HPが増加する。
Korean: 드레이븐 경은 등장 시 이 피를 잔뜩 마셔 체력을 추가로 획득합니다.

English: Mainly acquired by defeating waves and spent at the Trader.
English (reviewed): Mainly acquired by defeating waves and spent at the Trader.
Simplified Chinese: 主要通过击败敌人波次获得，可用来在商人处购买商品。
German: Wird hauptsächlich durch das Besiegen von Wellen erworben und beim Händler ausgegeben.
Spanish: Acquisito principalmente sconfiggendo le onde e speso presso il Mercante.
Russian: Как правило, добываются при победе над волнами врагов. Можно потратить у торговца.
Japanese: 主にウェーブクリア時に入手でき、商人とのトレードに使える。
Korean: 주로 웨이브 처치 시 획득할 수 있으며 거래소에서 사용됩니다.

English: Fancy furniture. Can be sold for denarii in late game buildings.
English (reviewed): Fancy furniture. Can be sold for Denarii in late-game buildings.
Simplified Chinese: 高档家具，可以在后期建筑中出售以获取便士。
German: Schicke Möbel. Kann im späteren Spielverlauf gegen Denarii verkauft werden.
Spanish: Mobili fantasiosi. Puo' essere venduto per Denarii in edifici di fine partita.
Russian: Изысканная мебель. Можно продать за динарии в поздних постройках.
Japanese: 高価な家具。ゲーム後半に登場する施設で売却することで、デナリィを入手できる。
Korean: 멋진 가구입니다. 후기 건물에서 판매해 데나리를 획득할 수 있습니다.

English: A high standard of excellence in many cultures. Can be earned by selling goods at the market.
English (reviewed): A high standard of excellence in many cultures. Can be earned by selling goods at the market.
Simplified Chinese: 在众多文明中被视为贵重资源，可以通过在市场上出售商品获取。
German: Ein hoher Qualitätsstandard in vielen Kulturen. Kann durch den Verkauf von Waren auf dem Markt verdient werden.
Spanish: Un alto livello di eccellenza in molte culture. Puo' essere guadagnato vendendo beni sul mercato.
Russian: То, ради чего глупые людишки рвут друг другу глотки на протяжении тысячелетий. Можно заработать продажей товаров на рынке.
Japanese: 多くの文化において高い価値を持つ。市場で商品を販売することで入手できる。
Korean: 많은 문화권에서 높은 수준의 탁월함을 의미합니다. 시장에서 물건을 판매해 획득할 수 있습니다.

English: Relics are used exclusively in the cemetery.
English (reviewed): Relics are used exclusively in the cemetery.
Simplified Chinese: 遗物仅可在墓地中使用。
German: Relikte werden ausschließlich auf dem Friedhof verwendet.
Spanish: Le reliquie sono utilizzate esclusivamente nel cimitero.
Japanese: レリックは墓でのみ使用される。

English: The most basic resource used to fund other productions.
English (reviewed): The most basic resource used to fund other productions.
Simplified Chinese: 最基本的资源，用处非常广泛。
German: Die grundlegendste Ressource zur Finanzierung anderer Produktionen.
Spanish: La risorsa piu' di base utilizzata per finanziare altre produzioni.
Russian: ...потому что без воды и не туды, и не сюды.
Japanese: ほかの生産施設を支える最も基本的な資源。
Korean: 다른 자원 생산에 사용되는 가장 기본적인 자원입니다.

English: Source of food for a wide variety of creatures.
English (reviewed): A source of food for a wide variety of creatures.
Simplified Chinese: 许多生物都会以这种食物为生。
German: Nahrungsquelle für eine Vielzahl von Lebewesen.
Spanish: Una fonte di cibo per un'ampia varieta' di creature.
Japanese: 幅広い生物にとっての食べ物の源。

English: Processed grapes. Wine provides {&1} morale for your troops. It is consumed constantly when troops are in battle.
English (reviewed): Processed grapes. Wine provides {&1} morale for your troops. It is consumed constantly when troops are in battle.
Simplified Chinese: 加工过的葡萄。葡萄酒会为你的部队提供{&1}点士气，在部队战斗时会持续消耗。
German: Verarbeitete Trauben. Wein verleiht Euren Truppen {&1} Moral. Wird ständig verbraucht, wenn sich Truppen im Kampf befinden.
Spanish: Uva elaborata. Il vino fornisce {&1} morale per le tue truppe. Viene consumato costantemente quando le truppe sono in battaglia.
Russian: Перебродивший виноградный сок. Вино дает {&1} боевого духа вашим воинам. Во время битвы вино тратится постоянно.
Japanese: ブドウを加工したもの。ワインは自軍ユニットの士気を{&1}向上させる。ユニットが戦闘を行っていると常に消費される。
Korean: 포도를 가공한 것입니다. 와인은 병력에 사기를 {&1} 제공합니다. 병력이 전투 중일 경우 계속해서 소모됩니다.

Spanish: Il materiale da costruzione piu' semplice.
Japanese: 最もシンプルな建築資材。
伝説のアーティファクト
施設のアップグレード

English: Search the ancient ruins for Relics to make yourself even mightier.
English (reviewed): Search the ancient ruins for Relics to make yourself even mightier.
Simplified Chinese: 在古老的废墟中探寻遗物，让王国变得更加强大。
German: Durchsucht die antiken Ruinen nach Relikten, um noch mächtiger zu werden.
Spanish: Scava reliquie e manufatti speciali nelle antiche rovine.
Russian: Ищите реликвии в древних руинах, чтобы сосредоточить в своих руках еще больше силы.
Japanese: 古代遺跡に眠るレリックを見つけ出し、より強大な存在となれ。
Korean: 고대 유적에서 유품을 찾아 더욱 강해지세요.

English: The earth is shattering. Lead your infernal summons to victory before lava consumes all.
English (reviewed): The earth is shattering. Lead your summoned infernals to victory before the lava consumes all.
Simplified Chinese: 大地在震颤。赶在熔岩吞噬万物之前，带领你召唤的恶魔获得胜利。
German: Die Erde bebt. Führt Eure beschworenen Höllenbestien zum Sieg, bevor die Lava alles verschlingt.
Spanish: La Terra si sta frantumando. Conduci i tuoi infermieri evocati alla vittoria prima che la lava consuma tutto.
Russian: Земля раскололась! Приведите призванных обитателей ада к победе, пока все не поглотила лава.
Japanese: 大地が崩壊しつつある。溶岩にすべてが飲み込まれてしまう前に、地獄からの使者を率いて勝利せよ。
Korean: 땅이 부서지고 있습니다. 용암이 모든 것을 삼키기 전에 소환된 지옥 생물들을 승리로 이끄세요.

Japanese: 基本的な操作を学びましょう。

English: Defend your kingdom against goblins and slay the Dragon.
English (reviewed): Defend your kingdom against goblins and slay the Dragon.
Simplified Chinese: 保护你的王国免受哥布林侵袭，杀死巨龙。
German: Verteidigt Euer Königreich gegen Kobolde und tötet den Drachen.
Spanish: Difendi il tuo regno contro Goblin e uccida il drago.
Russian: Защитите королевство от гоблинов и одолейте дракона.
Japanese: ゴブリンから王国を守り、ドラゴンを倒せ。

English: Buildings can not be moved after construction
English (reviewed): Buildings cannot be moved after construction
Simplified Chinese: 建筑物建成之后无法移动
German: Gebäude können nach dem Bau nicht mehr verschoben werden
Spanish: Gli edifici non possono essere spostati dopo la costruzione
Russian: После возведения постройки уже нельзя перемещать
Japanese: 建設後の施設を移設できない
Korean: 건물은 건설 후 이동할 수 없습니다

English: All buildings and units are {&1}% cheaper, units deal {&2}% more damage to enemies
English (reviewed): All buildings and units are {&1}% cheaper, units deal {&2}% more damage to enemies
Simplified Chinese: 所有建筑与单位成本降低{&1}%，所有单位对敌人造成的伤害提高{&2}%
German: Alle Gebäude und Einheiten sind {&1} % günstiger und Einheiten verursachen {&2} % mehr Schaden bei Gegnern
Spanish: Tutti gli edifici e le unita' sono {&1}% piu' economico, le unita' si occupano {&2}% piu' danni ai nemici
Russian: Все постройки и юниты стоят на {&1}% дешевле. Юниты наносят врагам на {&2}% больше урона
Japanese: すべての施設とユニットのコストが{&1}%減少し、ユニットが敵に与えるダメージが{&2}%増加する
Korean: 모든 건물 및 유닛 비용이 {&1}% 감소하고, 유닛의 공격력이 {&2}% 증가합니다

English: {&1}% of your castle is covered by vines on start
English (reviewed): {&1}% of your castle is covered by vines at the start of the run
Simplified Chinese: 游戏开始时，你的城堡有{&1}%的区域被藤蔓覆盖
German: {&1} % Eures Schlosses sind zu Beginn des Durchgangs mit Ranken bedeckt
Spanish: {&1}% del tuo castello e' coperto da viti all'inizio della corsa
Russian: {&1}% вашего замка увито плющом в начале забега
Japanese: ステージ開始時に、城の{&1}%がつる草に覆われる
Korean: 세션 시작 시, 성의 {&1}%가 덩굴로 뒤덮입니다

English: {&1}% of your castle is covered by unproductive tiles on start
English (reviewed): {&1}% of your castle is covered by unproductive tiles at the start of the run
Simplified Chinese: 游戏开始时，你的城堡有{&1}%的区域被无法进行生产的地块覆盖
German: {&1} % Eures Schlosses sind zu Beginn des Durchgangs mit unproduktiven Feldern bedeckt
Spanish: {&1}% del tuo castello e' coperto da piastrelle improduttive all'inizio della corsa
Russian: {&1}% вашего замка занято низкопроизводительными клетками в начале забега
Japanese: ステージ開始時に、城の{&1}%がデバフタイルに覆われる
Korean: 세션 시작 시, 성의 {&1}%가 생산 방해 타일로 뒤덮입니다

Simplified Chinese: 游戏开始时，欠下{&1}枚金币的债务
Russian: Вы начинаете с долгом в {&1} золота
Japanese: 金を{&1}個借りた状態でスタートする

English: {&1}% of your castle is covered by vines on start
English (reviewed): {&1}% of your castle is covered by vines at the start of the run
Simplified Chinese: 游戏开始时，你的城堡有{&1}%的区域被藤蔓覆盖
German: {&1} % Eures Schlosses sind zu Beginn des Durchgangs mit Ranken bedeckt
Spanish: {&1}% del tuo castello e' coperto da viti all'inizio della corsa
Russian: {&1}% вашего замка увито плющом в начале забега
Japanese: ステージ開始時に、城の{&1}%がつる草に覆われる
Korean: 세션 시작 시, 성의 {&1}%가 덩굴로 뒤덮입니다

Russian: Число модификаторов у боссов увеличено на {&1}
Japanese: ボスに{&1}個の特殊効果が追加される

Russian: Число модификаторов у боссов увеличено на {&1}
Japanese: ボスに{&1}個の特殊効果が追加される

Simplified Chinese: 所有敌人造成的伤害提高{&1}%
Spanish: Tutti i nemici si occupano {&1}% in piu' danni
Russian: Все враги наносят на {&1}% больше урона
Japanese: すべての敵が与えるダメージが{&1}%増加する

Simplified Chinese: 所有敌人造成的伤害提高{&1}%
Spanish: Tutti i nemici si occupano {&1}% in piu' danni
Russian: Все враги наносят на {&1}% больше урона
Japanese: すべての敵が与えるダメージが{&1}%増加する

Simplified Chinese: 所有敌人的生命值提高{&1}%
Spanish: Tutti i nemici hanno {&1}% in piu' HP
Russian: У всех врагов на {&1}% больше здоровья
Japanese: すべての敵のHPが{&1}%増加する

Simplified Chinese: 所有敌人的生命值提高{&1}%
Spanish: Tutti i nemici hanno {&1}% in piu' HP
Russian: У всех врагов на {&1}% больше здоровья
Japanese: すべての敵のHPが{&1}%増加する

Simplified Chinese: 所有敌人的生命值提高{&1}%
Spanish: Tutti i nemici hanno {&1}% in piu' HP
Russian: У всех врагов на {&1}% больше здоровья
Japanese: すべての敵のHPが{&1}%増加する

English: 1 boss less than usual will attack your castle
English (reviewed): 1 boss fewer than usual will attack your castle
Simplified Chinese: 攻击城堡的首领减少1位
German: 1 Boss weniger als üblich wird Euer Schloss angreifen
Spanish: 1 boss in meno del solito attacchera' il tuo castello
Russian: На ваш замок нападет на одного босса меньше
Japanese: 城を攻撃してくるボスが通常より1体少ない
ユニット上限が{&1}減少する

English: Price of upgrading Unit limit and Vision is inscreased by {&1}%
English (reviewed): Price of upgrading unit limit and gaze is increased by {&1}%
Simplified Chinese: 单位上限与凝视范围的升级费用提高{&1}%
German: Der Preis für die Aufrüstung des Einheitenlimits und Erweiterung des Sichtfelds erhöht sich um {&1} %
Spanish: Il prezzo del limite e dello sguardo dell'unita' di aggiornamento e' aumentato di {&1}%
Russian: Стоимость улучшения лимита юнитов и радиуса взора повышена на {&1}%
Japanese: ユニット上限と視線のアップグレードコストが{&1}%増加する
Korean: 유닛 한도 및 시선 업그레이드 비용이 {&1}% 증가합니다

English: Price of upgrading Unit limit and Vision is inscreased by {&1}%
English (reviewed): Price of upgrading unit limit and gaze is increased by {&1}%
Simplified Chinese: 单位上限与凝视范围的升级费用提高{&1}%
German: Der Preis für die Aufrüstung des Einheitenlimits und Erweiterung des Sichtfelds erhöht sich um {&1} %
Spanish: Il prezzo del limite e dello sguardo dell'unita' di aggiornamento e' aumentato di {&1}%
Russian: Стоимость улучшения лимита юнитов и радиуса взора повышена на {&1}%
Japanese: ユニット上限と視線のアップグレードコストが{&1}%増加する
Korean: 유닛 한도 및 시선 업그레이드 비용이 {&1}% 증가합니다

English: Acid rain slowly damages your troops. It won't stop until the boss is defeated.
English (reviewed): Acid rain slowly damages your troops. It won't stop until the boss is defeated.
Simplified Chinese: 酸雨会对你的部队缓慢造成伤害。只有当击败首领之后，酸雨才会停止。
German: Saurer Regen fügt Euren Truppen langsam Schaden zu. Es wird nicht aufhören, bis der Boss besiegt ist.
Spanish: La pioggia acida danneggia lentamente le tue truppe. Non si fermera' fino a quando il boss non sara' sconfitto.
Russian: Кислотный дождь медленно наносит урон вашему войску и не прекратится, пока босс не будет побежден.
Japanese: ボスを撃破するまで酸性雨が振り続け、自軍ユニットがじわじわとダメージを受ける。
Korean: 산성비가 조금씩 병력에 대미지를 가합니다. 보스를 처치할 때까지 비가 계속 내립니다.

English: Everytime one of your troops dies you receive {&1} Blood.
English (reviewed): Any time one of your troops dies, you receive {&1} Blood.
Simplified Chinese: 每当己方部队阵亡时，都会产生{&1}单位鲜血。
German: Jedes Mal, wenn eine Eurer Truppen fällt, erhaltet Ihr {&1} Blut.
Spanish: Ogni volta che una delle tue truppe muore, ricevi {&1} sangue.
Russian: После смерти любого из ваших воинов вы получаете {&1} крови.
Japanese: 自軍ユニットが撃破されると血液を{&1}個入手する。

English: Everytime any resource is produced there is a {&1}% chance to produce Blood. All the blood that is left by the time the boss arrives will contribute to his Health ({&2}% more HP per {&3} Blood). You receive 2 new buildings that can utilize or get rid of the blood produced.
English (reviewed): Any time a resource is produced, there is a {&1}% chance of producing Blood. All the Blood left over when the boss arrives will contribute to his Health ({&2}% more HP per {&3} Blood). You receive 2 new buildings that can utilize or get rid of the Blood produced.
Simplified Chinese: 每当生产资源时，都会有{&1}%的几率生产鲜血。当首领抵达时，所有剩余的鲜血都会提高首领的生命值（每拥有{&3}单位鲜血，首领生命值提高{&2}%）。不过，你会得到2种新的建筑，用来消耗或丢弃产生的鲜血。
German: Jedes Mal, wenn eine Ressource produziert wird, besteht eine Chance von {&1} %, dass Blut entsteht. Das gesamte Blut, das bei Eintreffen des Bosses übrig bleibt, trägt zu seiner Gesundheit bei ({&2} % mehr LP pro {&3} Blut). Ihr erhaltet 2 neue Gebäude, die das produzierte Blut nutzen oder entsorgen können.
Spanish: Ogni volta che viene prodotta una risorsa, c'è una probabilità del {&1}% che venga generato Sangue. Tutto il Sangue accumulato all'arrivo del boss contribuirà alla sua Salute ({&2}% di HP in più ogni {&3} unità di Sangue). Ricevi 2 nuovi edifici che possono utilizzare o eliminare il Sangue prodotto.
Russian: Каждый раз, когда производится какой-то ресурс, с шансом {&1}% вы получите кровь. Вся кровь, которая еще останется к приходу босса, даст ему прибавку к здоровью ({&2}% ОЗ за {&3} крови). При этом вы получите 2 постройки, которые: а) могут использовать полученную кровь; б) помогут избавляться от нее.
Japanese: 資源生産時、{&1}%の確率で血液も生産される。ボス登場時に血液が残っていると、ボスのHPがその分増加する（血液{&2}個につきHPが{&3}%増加）。生産された血液を利用、または除去できる2種類の新施設が登場する。
Korean: 자원이 생산될 때마다 {&1}% 확률로 피가 생산됩니다. 보스 등장 시 남은 모든 피는 보스 체력에 포함됩니다(피 {&3}개당 {&2}% 증가). 생산된 피를 활용하거나 제거할 수 있는 새로운 건물 2개를 받습니다.

English: An enemy scarecrow is spawned at the start of every wave.
English (reviewed): An enemy scarecrow is spawned at the start of each wave.
Simplified Chinese: 每波开始时，出现一只敌方稻草人。
German: Zu Beginn jeder Welle erscheint eine feindliche Vogelscheuche.
Russian: В начале каждой волны появляется вражеское пугало.
Japanese: 各ウェーブ開始時に、敵のカカシが1体出現する。
Korean: 각 웨이브 시작 시, 적 허수아비가 생성됩니다.

English: Boss' HP is increased by {&1}% for each point of Castle's HP below 100.
English (reviewed): Boss's HP is increased by {&1}% for each point of your castle's HP below 100.
Simplified Chinese: 如果你的城堡生命值低于100点，则每缺少1点生命值，首领的生命值就会提高{&1}%。
German: Die LP des Bosses erhöhen sich für jeden LP, der Eurem Schloss auf 100 fehlt, um {&1} %.
Spanish: Gli HP di Boss sono aumentati di {&1}% per ogni punto dei HP del tuo castello sotto i 100.
Russian: Когда прочность вашего замка падает ниже 100, каждое потерянное очко прочности повышает здоровье босса на {&1}%.
Japanese: 城のHPが100未満の場合、100からの減少量1ポイントにつきボスのHPが{&1}%増加する。
Korean: 성 HP가 100 미만이 될 때마다 보스 HP가 {&1}% 증가합니다.

English: Buildings start freezing over time when they are not working. A completely frozen building will not work when watched and will require your gaze on it to return back to normal.
English (reviewed): Buildings start freezing over time when they are not working. A completely frozen building will not work even when being watched and will require your gaze to linger on it for a while to return it to normal.
Simplified Chinese: 建筑物不再工作时会慢慢结冰。当建筑物彻底冻结之后，即便是处于监督状态也无法继续工作，需要持续监督一段时间后才能恢复正常。
German: Wenn Gebäude nicht produzieren, beginnen sie mit der Zeit einzufrieren. Ein vollständig gefrorenes Gebäude produziert auch dann nicht mehr, wenn Ihr es beobachtet. Euer Blick muss dann eine Weile darauf verweilen, bis es den Betrieb wieder aufnimmt.
Spanish: Gli edifici iniziano a congelare nel tempo quando non funzionano. Un edificio completamente congelato non funzionera' nemmeno quando viene guardato e richiedera' lo sguardo per indugiare per un po 'per restituirlo alla normalita'.
Russian: Неработающие постройки начнут постепенно замерзать. Полностью замерзшая постройка не будет работать, даже когда вы на нее смотрите, и для ее повторного запуска придется задержать на ней взор на какое-то время.
Japanese: 稼働していない施設が徐々に凍結していく。完全に凍結してしまった施設はウォッチされても稼働しなくなる。正常な状態に戻すには、一定時間ウォッチし続ける必要がある。
Korean: 건물이 작업하지 않으면 점점 얼어붙습니다. 완전히 얼어붙은 건물은 주시해도 작업하지 않으며 정상으로 되돌리려면 일정 시간 동안 시선을 유지해야 합니다.

English: Enemies move speed is increased by {&1}%.
English (reviewed): Enemy move speed is increased by {&1}%.
German: Die Bewegungsgeschwindigkeit des Gegners wird um {&1} % erhöht.
Spanish: La velocita' di spostamento del nemico e' aumentata di {&1}%.
Japanese: 敵の移動速度が{&1}%増加する。

English: Every wave one enemy with the highest HP will be reborn when they die.
English (reviewed): During each wave, the enemy with the highest HP will be reborn when they die.
Simplified Chinese: 每波中生命值最高的敌人死后会重生一次。
German: Während jeder Welle wird der gefallene Gegner mit den höchsten LP nach seinem Tod wiedergeboren.
Spanish: Durante ogni ondata, il nemico con il piu' alto HP rinascera' quando muoiono.
Russian: Во время каждой волны враг с самым высоким показателем здоровьем будет возрожден после смерти.
Japanese: 各ウェーブ中、最もHPが高い敵が倒された際に復活する。
Korean: 각 웨이브에서 HP가 가장 높은 적이 사망 후 부활합니다.

English: A flying witch will debuff your troops with Weakness (-{&1}% attack speed and -{&2}% move speed) when it flies past them.
English (reviewed): A flying witch will debuff your troops with Weakness (-{&1}% attack speed and -{&2}% movement speed) when it flies past them.
Simplified Chinese: 女巫会从你的部队上方飞过，为你的部队施加虚弱状态（攻击速度降低{&1}%，移动速度降低{&2}%）。
German: Eine fliegende Hexe schwächt Eure Truppen (-{&1} % Angriffsgeschwindigkeit und -{&2} % Bewegungsgeschwindigkeit), wenn sie an ihnen vorbeifliegt.
Spanish: Una strega volante debuttera' le tue truppe con debolezza ( -{&1}% velocita' di attacco e -{&2}% velocita' di movimento) quando le vola oltre.
Russian: Летучая ведьма наложит Бессилие на ваших воинов (-{&1}% от скорости атаки и -{&2}% от скорости движения), если пролетит мимо них.
Japanese: 魔女が飛び回り、頭上を通り過ぎた自軍ユニットを弱体状態（攻撃速度が{&1}%、移動速度が{&2}%減少）にする。
Korean: 날아다니는 마녀가 아군 병력을 통과할 때마다 약점(공격 속도 -{&1}% 및 이동 속도 -{&2}%) 디버프가 적용됩니다.

English: At the start of every wave an icy meteor will fall on your army. Troops caught in the blast will become frozen. You receive a special building that generates defrosting spells.
English (reviewed): At the start of each wave, an icy meteor will fall on your army. Troops caught in the blast will become frozen. You receive a special building that generates defrosting spells.
Simplified Chinese: 每波开始时，一颗寒冰陨石会砸在你的军队头上。所有被爆炸波及的部队都会被冻住。你会获得一座特殊建筑，用来生产解冻法术。
German: Zu Beginn jeder Welle stürzt ein vereister Meteorit auf Eure Armee. Truppen, die von der Explosion erfasst werden, frieren ein. Ihr erhaltet ein spezielles Gebäude, das Auftauzauber erzeugt.
Spanish: All'inizio di ogni ondata, una meteora ghiacciata cadra' sul tuo esercito. Le truppe catturate nell'esplosione si congeleranno. Ricevi un edificio speciale che genera incantesimi di scongelamento.
Russian: В начале каждой волны на ваше войско упадет ледяной метеор. Он заморозит воинов в радиусе действия, но вы получите особую постройку, которая будет производить размораживающие заклинания.
Japanese: 各ウェーブ開始時に非常に冷たい隕石が自軍目掛けて落下し、爆発に巻き込まれたユニットは凍結してしまう。解凍呪文を生産する特別な施設が登場する。
Korean: 각 웨이브 시작 시, 얼음 운석이 아군 위로 떨어집니다. 눈보라에 갇힌 병력은 얼어붙습니다. 해동 주문을 생성하는 특수 건물이 제공됩니다.

English: Invincible Hermit Alchemists ({&1}) will occupy your army until the boss is defeated.
English (reviewed): Invincible Hermit Alchemists ({&1}) will occupy your army until the boss is defeated.
Simplified Chinese: 无敌的炼金术士隐者（{&1}）将会占据你的部队名额，直到首领被击败为止。
German: Unbesiegbare Einsiedler-Alchemisten ({&1}) belegen Plätze in Eurer Armee, bis der Boss besiegt ist.
Spanish: Alchimisti eremiti invincibili ({&1}) occupera' il tuo esercito fino a quando il capo non sara' sconfitto.
Russian: Неуязвимые алхимики-отшельники ({&1}) будут занимать ваше войско до победы над боссом.
Japanese: ボスを撃破するまで世捨て人の錬金術師（{&1}）が自軍に居座り、排除できない。
Korean: 보스를 처치할 때까지 무적 상태인 은둔 연금술사({&1})가 아군 병력 슬롯을 차지합니다.

English: Extra Hermit Alchemists will occupy your army ({&1}). They will occasionally throw potions at your buildings that debuff their production rate.
English (reviewed): Extra Hermit Alchemists will occupy your army ({&1}). They will occasionally throw potions at your buildings that debuff their production rate.
Simplified Chinese: 更多无敌的炼金术士隐者（{&1}）将会占据你的部队名额。这些隐者偶尔会向你的建筑投掷魔药，降低建筑的生产速度。
German: Zusätzliche Einsiedler-Alchemisten belegen Plätze in Eurer Armee ({&1}). Sie bewerfen Eure Gebäude gelegentlich mit Tränken, die ihre Produktivität senken.
Spanish: Gli alchimisti extra eremiti occupano il tuo esercito ({&1}). Occasionalmente lanceranno pozioni nei tuoi edifici che debuttuano il loro tasso di produzione.
Russian: Еще больше алхимиков-отшельников ({&1}) будет занимать ваше войско. Время от времени они также будут швырять в ваши постройки зелья, ухудшающие производительность.
Japanese: さらに厄介になった世捨て人の錬金術師が自軍に居座る（{&1}）。この錬金術師は時々、施設にポーションを投げつけて生産速度を減少させる。
Korean: 은둔 연금술사가 추가로 나타나 아군 병력 슬롯을 차지합니다({&1}). 종종 건물에 물약을 던져 생산 속도에 디버프를 적용합니다.

English: Sometimes one of your troops will become marked for death and will wander off into the woods to meet their fate, unable to participate in fights.
English (reviewed): Sometimes, one of your troops will become marked for death and will wander off into the woods to meet their fate, unable to participate in fights.
Simplified Chinese: 你的部队偶尔会被打上死亡印记。被打上印记的部队会游荡到森林之中，面对自己的命运，无法参加战斗。
German: Manchmal wird einer Eurer Soldaten zum Tode verurteilt und läuft in den Wald, seinem Schicksal entgegen. Fortan nimmt er nicht mehr an Kämpfen teil.
Spanish: A volte, una delle tue truppe sara' segnato per la morte e vagera' nei boschi per incontrare il loro destino, incapace di partecipare a combattimenti.
Russian: Время от времени кому-то из ваших воинов будет приходить метка смерти. После этого они больше не смогут сражаться и уйдут в леса навстречу судьбе.
Japanese: 時々、自軍ユニット1体が「死の印」を受ける。印を受けたユニットは森に迷い込んで最期を迎え、戦線から離脱する。
Korean: 가끔 병력 하나에 죽음의 낙인이 찍히고 운명을 맞이하기 위해 전투에서 이탈한 후 숲으로 떠납니다.

English: Every once in a while your gaze is moved on its own.
English (reviewed): Every once in a while, your gaze moves on its own.
Simplified Chinese: 每隔一段时间，你的凝视就会自行移动。
German: Hin und wieder bewegt sich Euer Sichtfeld von selbst.
Spanish: Di tanto in tanto, il tuo sguardo si muove da solo.
Russian: Время от времени ваш взор будет двигаться сам по себе.

English: Outer tiles are occupied by Lich's palaces and cannot be used for building until he is defeated.
English (reviewed): Outer tiles are occupied by Lich's Palaces and cannot be used for building until he is defeated.
Simplified Chinese: 外面的地块建造着巫妖的宫殿。只有消灭巫妖，才能在这些地块上建造建筑。
German: Die äußeren Felder sind von Lich-Palästen besetzt und können nicht zum Bauen verwendet werden, bis er besiegt ist.
Spanish: Le piastrelle esterne sono occupate dai palazzi di Araknor e non possono essere utilizzate per la costruzione fino a quando non viene sconfitto.
Russian: Внешние клетки будут заняты Дворцами лича, и до победы над личем строить на них что-то не получится.
Japanese: 外側のタイルがリッチの宮殿に占拠され、リッチを撃破するまで使用できなくなる。
Korean: 외곽 타일이 리치의 궁전에 점령당해 리치를 쓰러뜨릴 때까지 건물을 건설할 수 없습니다.

English: {&1} Poisonous snakes are spawned whenever you cast a spell.
English (reviewed): {&1} Poisonous snakes spawn whenever you cast a spell.
Simplified Chinese: 每当你使用法术时，都会出现{&1}条毒蛇。
German: {&1} Immer wenn Ihr einen Zauber wirkt, erscheinen giftige Schlangen.
Spanish: {&1} Snakes velenosi si genera ogni volta che lanci un incantesimo.
Russian: Каждый раз, когда вы используете заклинания, будут появляться ядовитые змеи в количестве {&1} штук.
Japanese: 呪文を使用するたびに毒蛇が{&1}体出現する。

English: {&1} Poisonous snakes join each enemy wave.
English (reviewed): {&1} Poisonous snakes join each enemy wave.
Simplified Chinese: 每波敌人出现时，都会出现{&1}条毒蛇。
German: {&1} Giftige Schlangen schließen sich jeder feindlichen Welle an.
Spanish: {&1} Snakes velenosi unisciti a ogni onda nemico.
Russian: К каждой новой волне врагов присоединятся ядовитые змеи в количестве {&1} штук.
Japanese: 各ウェーブの敵に、{&1}体の毒蛇が加わる。

English: A Zombie is spawned when an enemy dies. {&1} zombies will also rise when the digging of the Ruins is completed.
English (reviewed): A Zombie spawns when an enemy dies. {&1} zombies will also rise when the excavation of the Ruins is completed.
Simplified Chinese: 敌人死亡时，尸体上会生成一只僵尸。废墟挖掘完成之后，会生成{&1}只僵尸。
German: Ein Zombie erscheint, wenn ein Gegner stirbt. {&1} Zombies werden zum Leben erweckt, wenn die Ausgrabung der Ruinen abgeschlossen ist.
Spanish: Uno zombi si genera quando muore un nemico. {&1} Anche gli zombi aumenteranno quando lo scavo delle rovine sara' completato.
Russian: Каждая гибель врага будет производить по одному зомби. Кроме того, после завершения раскопок руин появится еще {&1} зомби.
Japanese: 敵が死亡するとゾンビが1体出現する。遺跡の発掘が完了すると、さらに{&1}体のゾンビが出現する。
Korean: 적이 죽으면 좀비가 생성됩니다. 유적 발굴을 완료한 경우에도 {&1} 좀비가 등장합니다.

English (reviewed): Spell damage dealt is reduced by {&1}%
German: Der verursachte Zauberschaden wird um {&1} % reduziert
Spanish: Il danno agli incantesimi inferiti e' ridotto di {&1}%
Japanese: 呪文で与えるダメージが{&1}％減少する。

English: Whenever you use a spell, its containing slot becomes sealed for a period of time.
English (reviewed): Whenever you use a spell, the slot containing it becomes sealed for a period of time.
Simplified Chinese: 每当你使用法术后，相应的法术槽都会被封印一段时间。
German: Immer wenn Ihr einen Zauber verwendet, wird der entsprechende Slot für eine gewisse Zeit versiegelt.
Spanish: Ogni volta che usi un incantesimo, lo slot contenente viene sigillato per un periodo di tempo.
Russian: После каждого использования заклинания ячейка с ним будет на какое-то время запечатана.
Japanese: 呪文を使うと、その呪文のスロットが一定時間封印される。
Korean: 주문을 시전할 때마다 해당 주문이 포함된 슬롯이 일정 기간 봉인됩니다.

English: When the enemy wave arrives all your buildings are shuffled.
English (reviewed): When the enemy wave arrives, all your buildings are shuffled.
Simplified Chinese: 每波敌人出现时，你所有建筑的位置都会被打乱。
German: Wenn die feindliche Welle eintrifft, werden alle Eure Gebäude durcheinandergewirbelt.
Spanish: Quando arriva l'onda nemica, tutti i tuoi edifici sono mescolati.
Russian: С приходом новой волны врагов все ваши постройки будут разбросаны случайным образом.
Japanese: 各ウェーブで、敵の襲来時にすべての施設がシャッフルされる。
Korean: 적 웨이브 도착 시, 모든 건물이 섞입니다.

English: {&1} invincible wandering spirits will occupy your army until the boss is defeated.
English (reviewed): {&1} Invincible Wandering Spirits will occupy your army until the boss is defeated.
Simplified Chinese: {&1}只无敌的游荡幽灵将会占据你的部队名额，直到首领被击败为止。
German: {&1} Unbesiegbare Wandergeister belegen Plätze in Eurer Armee, bis der Boss besiegt ist.
Spanish: {&1} Gli spiriti errati invincibili occuperanno il tuo esercito fino a quando il capo non sara' sconfitto.
Russian: {&1} неуязвимых блуждающих духа(-ов) будут занимать ваше войско до победы над боссом.
Japanese: ボスを撃破するまで、無敵の彷徨う霊魂（{&1}）が自軍に居座る。
Korean: 보스를 처치할 때까지 {&1} 무적 상태인 방황하는 영혼이 아군 병력 슬롯을 차지합니다.

English: You will need to build the Carusel to keep Araknor's brother entertained. If he is not entertained, he will start losing HP. Watching the Carusel will heal him.
English (reviewed): You will need to build the Carousel to keep Araknor's brother entertained. If he is not entertained, he will start losing HP. Watching the Carousel will heal him.
Simplified Chinese: 你需要建造旋转木马，让阿拉克诺的弟弟保持开心。如果阿拉克诺的弟弟感到不满，便会开始失去生命值。监视旋转木马可以让阿拉克诺的弟弟恢复生命值。
German: Ihr müsst das Karussell bauen, um Araknors Bruder bei Laune zu halten. Wenn er nicht unterhalten wird, beginnt er, LP zu verlieren. Das Beobachten des Karussells wird ihn heilen.
Spanish: Dovrai costruire la giostra per intrattenere il fratello di Araknor. Se non e' intrattenuto, iniziera' a perdere HP. Sul lato positivo, guardare la giostra lo guarira'.
Russian: Вам придется построить Карусель, чтобы чем-то занять брата Аракнора. Он теряет здоровье, если не развлекается, но будет постепенно исцеляться, пока вы смотрите на Карусель.
Japanese: アラクノールの同胞を楽しませ続けるため、回転木馬を建設する必要がある。楽しくない状態の同胞はHPを失っていく。回転木馬をウォッチしていれば同胞のHPを回復できる。
Korean: 아라크노르의 형제를 계속 즐겁게 하려면 회전목마를 건설해야 합니다. 즐겁지 않으면 HP가 감소하기 때문이죠. 회전목마를 주시하면 치유됩니다.

English: Araknor's brother joins your army and will fight for you. If he dies by the time the boss arrives, Araknor will become enraged and his HP and damage will be increased by {&1}%.
English (reviewed): Araknor's brother joins your army and will fight for you. If he dies before the boss arrives, Araknor will become enraged, and his HP and damage dealt will be increased by {&1}%.
Simplified Chinese: 阿拉克诺的弟弟会加入你的军队，为你而战。如果它在阿拉克诺抵达前死亡，阿拉克诺将会陷入狂怒状态，生命值与伤害提高{&1}%。
German: Araknors Bruder schließt sich Eurer Armee an und wird für Euch kämpfen. Wenn er stirbt, bevor der Boss eintrifft, wird Araknor wütend und seine LP und sein verursachter Schaden erhöhen sich um {&1} %.
Spanish: Il fratello di Araknor vagera' il tuo regno. A meno che la giostra non sia costruita e attiva, il fratello morira' lentamente di noia. Se muore prima dell'arrivo del boss, Araknor si arrabbira' e i suoi HP e danno inflitti saranno aumentati di {&1}%.
Russian: К вашей армии присоединится брат Аракнора. Если он погибнет до прибытия босса, Аракнор впадет в ярость, которая повысит его здоровье и урон на {&1}%.
Japanese: アラクノールの同胞が部隊に加わり、王様のために戦ってくれる。同胞がボス登場前に死亡するとアラクノールが激怒し、アラクノールのHPと与ダメージが{&1}%増加する。
Korean: 아라크노르의 형제가 병력에 합류하고 왕을 위해 싸웁니다. 보스가 등장하기 전에 사망하면 아라크노르가 분노 상태가 되어 HP 및 공격력이 {&1}% 증가합니다.

English: At the start of each wave all your production is slowed by {&1}% and your troops are {&2}% slower. The debuff lasts for {&3} seconds.
English (reviewed): At the start of each wave, all your production is slowed by {&1}% and your troops are {&2}% slower. The debuff lasts for {&3} seconds.
Simplified Chinese: 每波开始时，所有生产速度降低{&1}%，所有部队的速度降低{&2}%，持续{&3}秒。
German: Zu Beginn jeder Welle verlangsamt sich Eure gesamte Produktion um {&1} % und auch Eure Truppen werden um {&2} % langsamer. Die Schwächung hält {&3} Sekunden an.
Spanish: All'inizio di ogni ondata, tutta la produzione viene rallentata di {&1}% e le tue truppe sono {&2}% piu' lento. Il debuff dura per {&3} secondi.
Russian: В начале каждой волны все ваше производство замедляется на {&1}%, а скорость воинов — на {&2}%. Этот эффект длится {&3} сек.
Japanese: 各ウェーブ開始時に、すべての生産施設の速度が{&1}%減少し、自軍ユニットも{&2}%遅くなる。このデバフは{&3}秒間持続する。
Korean: 각 웨이브 시작 시, 모든 생산 속도가 {&1}% 감소하고 병력 속도도 {&2}% 감소합니다. 디버프는 {&3}초 동안 지속됩니다.

English: Every wave a swamp appears on one of your empty tiles. The swamp needs to be cleared before the tile can be used for building again.
English (reviewed): During each wave, a swamp will appear on one of your empty tiles. The swamp needs to be cleared before the tile can be used for building again.
Simplified Chinese: 每波开始时，你的其中一块空白地块将会出现一片沼泽。需要清除沼泽才能在该地块上进行建造。
German: Während jeder Welle erscheint auf einem Eurer leeren Felder ein Sumpf. Der Sumpf muss trockengelegt werden, bevor das Feld wieder zum Bauen verwendet werden kann.
Spanish: Durante ogni onda, una palude apparira' su una delle tue piastrelle vuote. La palude deve essere cancellata prima che la piastrella possa essere utilizzata di nuovo per la costruzione.
Russian: Во время каждой волны на одной из ваших пустых клеток появится болото. Его придется расчистить перед тем, как что-то строить на этой клетке.
Japanese: 各ウェーブ中、空のタイルの1つに沼が発生する。そのタイルに再び施設を設置するには、沼を取り除く必要がある。
Korean: 각 웨이브 동안 빈 타일 한 곳에 늪이 나타납니다. 해당 타일에 건물을 건설하려면 늪을 제거해야 합니다.

English: Every battle your troops will flee from combat for {&1} seconds.
English (reviewed): During every battle, your troops will flee from combat for {&1} seconds.
Simplified Chinese: 每场战斗期间，己方部队都会四散奔逃，持续{&1}秒。
German: Während jeder Schlacht entfliehen Eure Truppen für {&1} Sekunden dem Kampf.
Spanish: Durante ogni battaglia, le tue truppe fuggiranno dal combattimento per {&1} secondi.
Russian: В каждой битве ваши воины будут сбегать с поля боя на {&1} сек.
Japanese: すべての戦闘中、自軍ユニットが{&1}秒間戦わなくなる。
Korean: 매 전투에서 병력이 {&1}초 동안 전투에서 달아납니다.

English: When the first enemy of the wave dies, a pack of {&1} zombies will arrive.
English (reviewed): When the first enemy of the wave dies, a pack of {&1} zombies will arrive.
Simplified Chinese: 当第一名敌人死亡时，{&1}只僵尸将会出现。
German: Wenn der erste Gegner der Welle stirbt, trifft eine Horde von {&1} Zombies ein.
Spanish: {&1} I teschi in fiamme si uniscono a ogni onda nemico.
Russian: После гибели первого врага волны появится группа из {&1} зомби.
Japanese: そのウェーブで初めて敵を倒した際に、{&1}ゾンビの群れが出現する。
Korean: 웨이브의 첫 적이 사망하면 {&1} 좀비 무리가 등장합니다.

English: After killing a boss, can get {&1} blueprints of {&2}
English (reviewed): After killing a boss, can get {&1} blueprints of {&2}
Simplified Chinese: 击败1位首领之后，可以从{&2}个蓝图中获得{&1}个
German: Für das Töten eines Bosses erhaltet Ihr {&1} Baupläne für {&2}
Spanish: Dopo aver ucciso un boss, puo' ottenere {&1} progetti di {&2}
Russian: После убийства босса можно получить {&1} чертежа(-ей): {&2}

English: After killing second boss, can get {&1} blueprints of {&2}
English (reviewed): After killing 2 bosses, can get {&1} blueprints of {&2}
Simplified Chinese: 击败2位首领之后，可以从{&2}个蓝图中获得{&1}个
German: Für das Töten von 2 Bossen erhaltet Ihr {&1} Baupläne für {&2}
Spanish: Dopo aver ucciso 2 boss, puo' ottenere {&1} progetti di {&2}
Russian: После убийства 2 боссов можно получить {&1} чертежа(-ей): {&2}

English: After killing third boss, can get {&1} blueprints of {&2}
English (reviewed): After killing 3 bosses, can get {&1} blueprints of {&2}
Simplified Chinese: 击败3位首领之后，可以从{&2}个蓝图中获得{&1}个
German: Für das Töten von 3 Bossen erhaltet Ihr {&1} Baupläne für {&2}
Spanish: Dopo aver ucciso 3 boss, puo' ottenere {&1} progetti di {&2}
Russian: После убийства 3 боссов можно получить {&1} чертежа(-ей): {&2}

German: Von der Plünderung zur Produktion I
Von der Plünderung zur Produktion II
Von der Plünderung zur Produktion III

English: You have accumulated enough resources to upgrade your vision area! You will be able to look over more buildings, so get this upgrade whenever you can. Note that each King has their own vision area and its upgrade path
English (reviewed): You have accumulated enough resources to upgrade the size of your gaze! You will be able to watch more buildings, so get this upgrade whenever you can. Note that each King has their own gaze size with a separate upgrade path
Simplified Chinese: 您已积累足够的资源，可以升级您的凝视范围！升级后，您将能够监视更多建筑物，因此请尽早进行此次升级。请注意，每位国王的凝视范围升级路径各自不同。
German: Ihr habt genügend Ressourcen gesammelt, um Euer Sichtfeld zu erweitern! Ihr wollt mehr Gebäude beobachten? Dann holt Euch dieses Upgrade, sobald Ihr könnt. Beachtet, dass jeder König sein eigenes Sichtfeld mit einem individuellen Upgrade-Pfad hat.
Spanish: Hai accumulato abbastanza risorse per aggiornare le dimensioni del tuo sguardo! Sarai in grado di guardare piu' edifici, quindi ottieni questo aggiornamento ogni volta che puoi. Si noti che ogni re ha la propria dimensione dello sguardo con un percorso di aggiornamento separato
Russian: У вас набралось достаточно ресурсов, чтобы расширить границы своего неусыпного королевского взора! Так вы сможете следить за большим числом построек одновременно, поэтому стоит поскорее заполучить это улучшение, как только оно станет доступно. Обратите внимание, что у каждого Короля своя площадь взора со своей схемой улучшения.

English: When you recruit a sizable army and reach the unit limit, you may want to get rid of weaker units or do some troops reorganization. \n\nClick "Management" in your Army tab.
English (reviewed): Once you've recruited a sizable army and reached the unit limit, you may want to get rid of weaker units or reorganize your troops. \n\nClick "Management" in the Army tab.
Simplified Chinese: 当您的军队规模不断扩大，达到上限时，您可能需要遣散部分战斗力较弱的单位，或对军队进行重组。\n\n点击"军队"选项卡中的"管理"按钮。
German: Wenn Ihr eine ansehnliche Armee rekrutiert und das Einheitenlimit erreicht habt, empfiehlt es sich, schwächere Einheiten loszuwerden und Eure Truppen neu aufzustellen. \n\nKlickt auf der Registerkarte "Armee" auf \"Verwaltung"\.
Spanish: Una volta che hai reclutato un esercito considerevole e raggiunto il limite dell'unita', potresti voler sbarazzarsi di unita' piu' deboli o riorganizzare le tue truppe.\n\nFai clic su "Gestione" nella scheda dell'esercito.
Russian: Когда ваша армия разрастется и достигнет лимита, возможно, вам захочется избавиться от более слабых юнитов или провести реорганизацию.\n\nДля этого выберите пункт \"Управление"\ на вкладке "Армия".

English:
Here you can see all the troops that you have recruited. 
You can order your units to go into the barracks where they won't be able to participate in fights. This is useful when you wish to hire new stronger troops but don't have space in your army.

The troops in the barracks can be let out later and can serve you as your backup army.
English (reviewed):
Here, you can see all the troops that you have recruited. 
You can order your units to go into the barracks where they won't be able to participate in fights. This is useful when you wish to hire new, stronger troops but don't have space in your army.

The troops in the barracks can be let out later and can serve as your backup army.
Simplified Chinese:
在这里，您可以查看所有已招募的部队。
您可以将部队调入营地，营地中的部队不会参与战斗。当您需要招募更强大的新单位，但军队空间不足时，"调入营地"这一操作将非常有用。

营地中的部队将会成为您的后备力量，随时准备投入未来的战斗。
German:
Hier findet Ihr alle Truppen, die Ihr rekrutiert habt. 
Ihr könnt Einheiten in die Kaserne beordern, wo sie nicht am Kampfgeschehen teilnehmen können. Das ist nützlich, wenn Ihr neue, stärkere Truppen anheuern wollt, aber keinen Platz in der Armee habt.

Die Truppen in der Kaserne könnt Ihr später als Reservearmee einsetzen.
Spanish:
Qui puoi vedere tutte le truppe che hai reclutato.
Puoi ordinare alle tue unità di entrare nella caserma, dove non potranno partecipare ai combattimenti. Questo è utile quando desideri assumere nuove truppe più forti ma non hai spazio nel tuo esercito.

Le truppe nella caserma possono essere fatte uscire in seguito e servire come esercito di riserva.
Russian:
Здесь вы сможете увидеть всех нанятых вами воинов.
Юнитов можно отправить в казармы, и тогда они не смогут участвовать в сражениях. Это пригодится, если вдруг вы захотите завербовать более сильных воинов, но в армии уже не останется места.

Позже воинов можно будет выпустить из казарм, и они станут вашей резервной армией.

English: You have received an Archery! Some proper troops will be useful right now as raids are getting tougher. Let the archers rain arrows while the peasants do the, uh... \up-close negotiations"."
English (reviewed): You have received an Archery! Some proper troops will be useful right now as raids are getting tougher. Let the archers shower the enemy with arrows while the peasants do the, uh... "up-close negotiations."
Simplified Chinese: 您获得了一座箭塔！随着敌人日益强大，您也需要英勇善战的部队。让弓箭手向敌人倾泻箭雨，而您的农民则可以进行......呃......"面对面谈判"。
German: Ihr habt eine Bogenschießanlage erhalten! Ein paar erfahrene Truppen sind jetzt von Vorteil, denn die Überfälle nehmen an Intensität zu. Lasst Eure Bogenschützen einen Pfeilhagel abfeuern, während sich die Bauern um die, äh ... "direkten Verhandlungen" kümmern.
Spanish: Hai ricevuto una struttura di Tiro con l'Arco! Ora puoi reclutare truppe adatte.
Russian: Теперь у вас есть Казармы стрелков! Хорошие солдаты сейчас очень кстати, ведь набеги становятся все напряженнее. Пусть Крестьяне \"проводят переговоры с позиции силы"\ под прикрытием дождя из стрел!

English: Gold doesn't grow on trees (unless you tax them). You get gold by selling resources at the market. Your next priority would be to gather enough materials for building it.
English (reviewed): Gold doesn't grow on trees (unless you tax them). You can get gold by selling resources at the market. Your next priority should be gathering enough materials to build it.
Simplified Chinese: 黄金不会从树上长出来（除非您对树征税）。您可以建造市场，在市场上出售资源以获取黄金。接下来的目标是积累足够的资源，建造市场。
German: Gold wächst nicht auf Bäumen (es sei denn, Ihr erhebt Steuern darauf). Verkauft Ressourcen auf dem Markt, um Gold zu erhalten. Eure nächste Priorität sollte sein, genügend Materialien für den Bau zu sammeln.
Spanish: L'oro non cresce sugli alberi (a meno che non li tassi). Puoi ottenere l'oro vendendo risorse sul mercato. La tua prossima priorita' dovrebbe essere raccogliere abbastanza materiali per costruirlo.
Russian: Золото не растет на деревьях (разве что обложить деревья налогом), но его можно получить за продажу ресурсов на рынке. Сейчас ваша задача — собрать материалы для постройки такого рынка.

English: You have everything required for the market. You should build it now.
English (reviewed): You have everything required for the market. You should build it now.
Simplified Chinese: 您已经拥有足够的资源来建造市场，立即开工吧。
German: Ihr habt alles, was Ihr für den Markt benötigt. Nun könnt Ihr mit dem Bau beginnen.
Spanish: Hai tutto cio' che e' richiesto per il mercato. Dovresti costruirlo ora.
Russian: У вас есть все для постройки рынка. Не откладывайте.

English: Your castle walls have received damage. Keep them intact if you don't want goblins inside.
English (reviewed): Your castle walls have received damage. Keep them intact if you don't want goblins to get inside.
Simplified Chinese: 城堡的城墙已经受损。如果您不想让哥布林冲进来的话，请尽快修复城墙。
German: Eure Schlossmauern wurden beschädigt. Sie sollten unversehrt bleiben, damit keine Kobolde eindringen.
Spanish: I tuoi muri del castello hanno ricevuto danni. Tienili intatti se non vuoi che i folletti entrino.
Russian: Стены замка повреждены. Защищайте и ремонтируйте их, если не хотите увидеть в королевском дворе гоблинов.

English:
Looks like it was the last of them. Great job!

The scouts are reporting that many more are coming. The true test of your kingdom lies ahead.
But for now take this, you earned it: 
{&1}
See if you can purchase or upgrade something in your kingdom.
English (reviewed):
Looks like that was the last of them. Great job!

The scouts are reporting that many more are coming. The true test of your kingdom lies ahead.
But for now, take this. You've earned it: 
{&1}
See if you can purchase or upgrade something in your kingdom.
Simplified Chinese:
刚刚应该就是最后一个敌人了，干得漂亮！

斥候的报告显示，还有更多敌人正在逼近，真正的考验即将到来。
至于现在，先收下这个奖励吧，这是您应得的：
{&1}
看看您能不能在王国中购买新的东西，或升级已有的东西。
German:
Das sollte der letzte gewesen sein. Gut gemacht!

Die Späher berichten, dass noch mehr unterwegs sind. Die wahre Prüfung steht Eurem Königreich noch bevor.
Doch nehmt zunächst dies. Ihr habt es Euch verdient: 
{&1}
Seht nach, ob Ihr in Eurem Königreich etwas kaufen oder verbessern könnt.
Spanish:
Sembra che fosse l’ultimo. Ottimo lavoro!

Gli esploratori riferiscono che molti altri stanno arrivando. La vera prova del tuo regno deve ancora venire.
Ma per ora, prendi questo. Te lo sei guadagnato:
{&1}
Vedi se puoi acquistare o potenziare qualcosa nel tuo regno.
Russian:
Кажется, отбились. Отлично!

Разведчики докладывают, что новые силы врага уже на подходе. Ничего-ничего, скоро ваше королевство по-настоящему испытают на прочность.
А пока вот ваша добыча: 
{&1}
Взгляните, что вы можете купить или улучшить в королевстве.

English:
If you ever wish to remove a building from your castle you can enter the demolish mode and destroy it.

You will be able to contruct it later, just remember that the spent resources will be lost.

Now that you have the received a new Troops building, we can replace the peasants with stronger troops. You should demolish one of the Peasant Huts and construct the Camp.
English (reviewed):
If you ever wish to remove a building from your castle, you can enter Demolish mode and destroy it.

You will be able to construct it later-just remember that the spent resources will be lost.

Now that you have received a new Troops building, we can replace the peasants with stronger troops. You should demolish one of the Peasant Huts and construct the Camp.
Simplified Chinese:
如果您打算拆除城堡中的建筑，请进入拆除模式并将其拆除。

被拆除的建筑可以重新建造，但请注意，消耗的资源不会返还。

如今您已经获得了新的部队建筑，我们可以把那些农民替换为更加强大的部队。您可以拆除其中一座农民小屋，建造兵营。
German:
Wenn Ihr jemals ein Gebäude aus Eurem Schloss entfernen wollt, wechselt in den Abrissmodus.

Ihr könnt es später erneut aufbauen, doch einmal verbrauchte Ressourcen sind verloren.

Das neue Truppengebäude ermöglicht Euch, die Bauern durch stärkere Truppen zu ersetzen. Ihr solltet eine der Bauernhütten abreißen und das Lager errichten.
Spanish:
Se desideri rimuovere un edificio dal tuo castello, puoi entrare in modalità Demolizione e distruggerlo.

Potrai ricostruirlo in seguito — ricordati solo che le risorse spese andranno perse.

Ora che hai ricevuto un nuovo edificio per le Truppe, possiamo sostituire i contadini con unità più forti. Dovresti demolire una delle Capanne dei Contadini e costruire l’Accampamento.
Russian:
Если захотите убрать какую-нибудь постройку из замка, перейдите в режим сноса.

В дальнейшем вы сможете возвести постройку еще раз, но помните, что затраченные ресурсы не возвращаются.

Теперь, когда у вас есть доступ к казармам, Крестьян можно заменить бойцами посильнее. Снесите одну из Хижин и постройте Лагерь.

English: Do you need some time to think? Press the 'Pause' button or 'Space' to pause the game. During it you will still be able to do most of the actions, like constructing buildings or casting spells.
English (reviewed): Do you need some time to think? Press the 'Pause' button or 'Space' to pause the game. During this time, you will still be able to perform most actions, like constructing buildings or casting spells.
Simplified Chinese: 您需要时间思考吗？点击"暂停"按钮或按下空格键即可暂停游戏。暂停游戏期间，您仍然可以执行绝大部分操作，例如建造建筑物或施展法术等。
German: Braucht Ihr Zeit zum Nachdenken? Dann wählt "Pause" oder drückt die Leertaste, um das Spiel anzuhalten. Während dieser Zeit könnt Ihr die meisten Aktionen dennoch ausführen, beispielsweise Gebäude errichten oder Zauber wirken.
Spanish: Hai bisogno di tempo per pensare? Premere il pulsante "Pausa" o "Spazio" per mettere in pausa il gioco. Durante questo periodo, sarai comunque in grado di eseguire la maggior parte delle azioni, come la costruzione di edifici o gli incantesimi di lancio.
Russian: Нужно время на раздумья? Нажмите кнопку паузы или пробел, чтобы поставить игру на паузу. В режиме паузы вы по-прежнему сможете выполнять большинство действий: например, строить или творить заклинания.

English: Now that your wells have brought you enough water, it is time to place a Wheat Field.
English (reviewed): Now that your wells have brought you enough water, it is time to place a Wheat Field.
Simplified Chinese: 您的水井已经提供了充足的水源，是时候建造一片麦田了。
German: Eure Brunnen haben genügend Wasser geliefert, nun könnt Ihr ein Weizenfeld anlegen.
Spanish: Ora che i tuoi pozzi ti hanno portato abbastanza acqua, e' tempo di posizionare un campo di grano.
Russian: Колодцы принесли уже достаточно воды. Пора вспахать Поле пшеницы.

English: Greetings King! I am Gustav, your loyal advisor. I am here to remind you how to manage your kingdom.
English (reviewed): Greetings, King! I am Gustav, your loyal advisor. I am here to remind you how to manage your kingdom.
Simplified Chinese: 您好，陛下！我是古斯塔夫，您忠诚的顾问，我可以提醒您如何管理您的王国。
German: Seid gegrüßt, König! Ich bin Gustav, Euer treuer Berater. Ich möchte Euch daran erinnern, wie Ihr Euer Königreich am besten verwalten könnt.
Spanish: Saluti, re! Sono Gustav, il tuo fedele consulente. Sono qui per ricordarti come gestire il tuo regno.
Russian: Здравствуйте, Ваше Величество! Я ваш верный советник Густав. Буду подсказывать вам, как управлять королевством.

English: The market is completed, good job! To start selling you need to choose the type of resource you are going to sell. \nRight now you only have wheat to sell. Open the management menu and select the wheat icon.
English (reviewed): The market is complete. Good job! To start selling, you need to choose the type of resource you are going to sell. \nRight now, you only have wheat to sell. Open the Management menu and select the wheat icon.
Simplified Chinese: 市场已经建设完毕，干得漂亮！若要出售资源，首先选择货物资源类型。\n目前，您只有"小麦"这一种资源。打开管理菜单，选择小麦图标即可。
German: Der Markt ist nun fertig. Gute Arbeit! Um mit dem Verkauf zu beginnen, müsst Ihr die Ressource auswählen, die Ihr verkaufen wollt. \nIm Moment habt Ihr nur Weizen zu verkaufen. Öffnet das Verwaltungsmenü und wählt das Weizensymbol aus.
Spanish: Il mercato e' completo. Buon lavoro! Per iniziare a vendere, devi scegliere il tipo di risorsa che stai per vendere.\nIn questo momento, hai solo grano da vendere. Apri il menu di gestione e seleziona l'icona del grano.
Russian: Отлично, Рынок построен! Чтобы продавать ресурсы, сперва нужно выбрать их тип.\nСейчас у вас есть только пшеница. Откройте "Управление" и выберите пшеницу (или просто нажмите на значок пшеницы).

English: Sire, have a look at people's Morale. Different Kings have different Morale effects and for you it's boosting the damage of all of your troops. There are different ways to increase it, for example, producing {&1} Wine.
English (reviewed): Sire, have a look at the people's morale. Different Kings have different morale effects, and for you, the damage dealt by all of your troops is boosted. There are different ways to increase it, such as producing {&1} wine.
Simplified Chinese: 陛下，查看一下臣民的士气吧。不同国王的士气效果各不相同，对您而言，当臣民士气较高的时候，您所有部队造成的伤害都会提高。有很多种方法可以提升士气，比如生产{&1}葡萄酒。
German: Eure Hoheit, werft einen Blick auf die Moral der Menschen. Jeder König hat andere Auswirkungen auf die Moral. In Eurem Fall verursachen alle Eure Truppen erhöhten Schaden. Ihr habt verschiedene Möglichkeiten, die Moral zu steigern, beispielsweise durch die Herstellung von {&1} Wein.
Spanish: Sire, dai un'occhiata al morale del popolo. Di diversi re hanno diversi effetti del morale e, per te, il danno inflitto da tutte le tue truppe e' potenziato. Esistono diversi modi per aumentarlo, come la produzione di vino {&1}.
Russian: Милорд, обратите внимание на боевой дух ваших подданных. Каждый Король по-своему влияет на боевой дух, и конкретно вы увеличиваете урон, наносимый вашими воинами. Повысить боевой дух можно разными способами: например, произведя {&1} вина.

English: Sire, planning your whole castle layout ahead is a formiddable task. So if you are ever in a need of moving your building somewhere else you can do so by holding {&1} and dragging it to the tile you wish. Moved buildings suffer a production penalty for some time (except wells) so resort to this only when you must.\n\nNow try moving a building somewhere.
English (reviewed): Sire, planning the layout of your whole castle is a formidable task. So if you ever need to move a building somewhere else, you can do so by holding {&1} and dragging it to a new tile. Moved buildings suffer a production penalty for some time (except wells), so resort to this only when you must.\n\nNow try moving a building somewhere.
Simplified Chinese: 陛下，规划整座城堡的布局是项艰巨的任务。如果您需要将某座建筑移动到其他位置，只要按住{&1}，将其拖拽至新的地块处即可。建筑移动之后，一段时间内生产速度会受到影响（水井除外）。因此，希望您仅在必要的情况下移动建筑。\n\n来试试吧，将其中一座建筑移动到其他位置。
German: Eure Hoheit, den Grundriss Eures Schlosses zu planen, ist wahrlich eine gewaltige Aufgabe. Wenn Ihr also ein Gebäude an eine andere Stelle verschieben wollt, könnt Ihr dies tun, indem Ihr {&1} gedrückt haltet und es auf ein neues Feld zieht. Verschobene Gebäude produzieren eine Zeit lang weniger (ausgenommen Brunnen). Greift also nur dann darauf zurück, wenn es unbedingt nötig ist.\n\nVersucht nun, ein Gebäude an einen anderen Platz zu verschieben.
Spanish: Sire, pianificare la disposizione dell’intero castello è un compito formidabile. Quindi, se mai dovesse servirti spostare un edificio, puoi farlo tenendo premuto {&1} e trascinandolo su una nuova tessera. Gli edifici spostati subiscono una penalità alla produzione per un certo periodo (eccetto i pozzi), quindi ricorri a questa opzione solo quando è davvero necessario.\n\nOra prova a spostare un edificio.
Russian: Милорд, планировка целого замка — дело очень серьезное. Если вам вдруг понадобится перенести постройку, зажмите {&1} и перетащите ее на другую клетку. Какое-то время постройка будет работать с пониженной эффективностью (если это не Колодец), так что по возможности избегайте переносов.\n\nТеперь попробуйте перенести постройку.

English: King, you have been given a prophecy. Here you can construct the next 3 waves of enemies that will attack you.\nWith stronger foes come better rewards! But be wise, not all treasure is meant to be won. A too strong enemy wave can wipe you castle away.\nNow make the decision so we can continue.
English (reviewed): King, you have been given a prophecy. Here, you can determine the next 3 waves of enemies that will attack you.\nWith stronger foes come better rewards! But be wise: not all treasure is meant to be won. An enemy wave that's too strong could wipe your castle away.\nNow make your decision so we can continue.
Simplified Chinese: 陛下，您获得了一则预言。您可以选择接下来三波的来袭之敌。\n敌人越强，奖励越好！但请您三思而后行，因为并非所有宝藏都值得争夺。如果敌人的力量过于强大，您的城堡可能会被夷为平地。\n请您做出选择，继续您的统治吧。
German: Mein König, Ihr habt eine Prophezeiung erhalten. Hier könnt Ihr die nächsten 3 feindlichen Wellen auswählen, die Euch angreifen werden.\nStärkere Gegner bringen bessere Belohnungen! Doch Vorsicht: Nicht jeder Schatz ist dazu da, gewonnen zu werden. Eine zu starke Welle könnte Eurem Schloss zum Verhängnis werden.\nEntscheidet jetzt, damit wir fortfahren können.
Spanish: Sire, ti è stata concessa una profezia. Qui puoi scegliere le prossime 3 ondate di nemici che ti attaccheranno.\nNemici più forti portano ricompense migliori! Ma sii saggio: non tutti i tesori sono destinati a essere conquistati. Un’ondata troppo potente potrebbe spazzare via il tuo castello.\nOra prendi una decisione, così possiamo proseguire.
Russian: Господин, на вас ниспослано пророчество. Вы вольны выбрать, какие враги будут атаковать вас в последующие 3 волны.\nЧем сложнее бой, тем лучше награды! Но будьте осторожны: всех сокровищ не добудешь, а слишком сильная волна врагов может захватить ваш замок.\nДелайте же свой выбор и продолжим.

English: The building has almost run out of its resource! When the limit is exhausted the building will be destroyed so be prepared to replace it with another Wheat field or a Tree.
English (reviewed): The building has almost run out of its resource! When the limit is reached, the building will be destroyed, so be prepared to replace it with another Wheat Field or a Tree.
Simplified Chinese: 这座建筑的资源即将耗尽！当资源耗尽时，建筑将会被摧毁。届时，请您用另一片麦田或一棵树来替代这座建筑。
German: Die Ressourcen des Gebäudes sind fast erschöpft! Wenn das Limit erreicht ist, wird das Gebäude zerstört. Bereitet Euch darauf vor, es durch ein neues Weizenfeld oder Bäume zu ersetzen.
Spanish: L'edificio ha quasi esaurito la sua risorsa! Quando viene raggiunto il limite, l'edificio verra' distrutto, quindi preparati a sostituirlo con un altro campo di grano o un albero.
Russian: Постройка практически исчерпала ресурс! Когда лимит достигнут, постройка уничтожается, так что будьте наготове заменить ее новым Полем пшеницы или Деревом.

English: You have received rewards for defeating the wave. Take them!
English (reviewed): You have received rewards for defeating the wave. Claim them!
Simplified Chinese: 击败敌人波次后，您将获得奖励，请立即领取吧！
German: Ihr habt die Welle besiegt und Belohnungen erhalten. Holt sie euch gleich!
Spanish: Hai ricevuto premi per aver sconfitto l'onda. Rivendicali!
Russian: Вы получили награды за победу над волной врагов. Заберите же их!

English: Looks like the trader has arrived! He sells a variety of items: buildings, spells, resources and more. I would recommend buying one of these artifacts but the choice is yours.
English (reviewed): Looks like the trader has arrived! He sells a variety of items: buildings, spells, resources and more. I would recommend buying one of these artifacts, but the choice is yours.
Simplified Chinese: 商人来啦！商人会出售各种物品，包括建筑、法术、资源等。我建议您考虑购买一件神器，但最终选择权在您手中。
German: Sieht aus, als wäre der Händler eingetroffen! Er verkauft verschiedene Gegenstände: Gebäude, Zauber, Ressourcen und mehr. Ich würde den Kauf eines dieser Artefakte empfehlen, aber die Entscheidung liegt natürlich bei Euch.
Spanish: Sembra che il trader sia arrivato! Vende una varieta' di articoli: edifici, incantesimi, risorse e altro ancora. Consiglierei di acquistare uno di questi artefatti, ma la scelta e' tua.
Russian: К нам прибыл торговец! Он продает постройки, заклинания, ресурсы и многое другое. Рекомендую приобрести какой-нибудь из этих артефактов, но решать вам.

English: Looks like you have received a spell. Some of them can drastically change the tide of battle or give you other bonuses. Drag and drop them into the battlefield when the opportunity arises.
English (reviewed): Looks like you have received a spell. Some of them can drastically change the tide of battle or give you bonuses. Drag and drop them into the battlefield when the opportunity arises.
Simplified Chinese: 看起来您获得了一项法术。部分法术能够扭转战局，或为您提供其他加成效果。需要施展法术时，直接将法术拖入战场，松手即可。
German: Sieht aus, als hättet Ihr einen Zauber erhalten. Manche Zauber können den Verlauf eines Kampfes beeinflussen oder Euch Boni verschaffen. Zieht sie einfach auf das Schlachtfeld, sobald sich die Gelegenheit ergibt.
Spanish: Sembra che tu abbia ricevuto un incantesimo. Alcuni di loro possono cambiare drasticamente la marea della battaglia o darti bonus. Trascinali e lasciali cadere sul campo di battaglia quando si presenta l'opportunita'.
Russian: Кажется, вы получили заклинание. Некоторые из них могут значительно повлиять на ход боя или принести вам другие преимущества. Перетащите заклинание на поле боя, когда представится возможность.

English: You can start your own spells production with the buildings you have just received.
English (reviewed): You can produce your own spells with the buildings you have just received.
Simplified Chinese: 您可以使用刚刚获得的建筑生产法术。
German: Mit den gerade erhaltenen Gebäuden könnt Ihr Eure eigenen Zaubersprüche erstellen.
Spanish: Puoi produrre i tuoi incantesimi con gli edifici che hai appena ricevuto.
Russian: Создавать заклинания можно в постройках, которые отныне вам доступны.

English: You are doing great my King! Ruling the kingdom is not only about the growth of the economy but also about defending against enemies. We know that the goblins have planned the raids on your castle, which you can see on the time line.
English (reviewed): You are doing great my King! Ruling the kingdom is not only about the growth of the economy but also defending against enemies. We know that the goblins have planned raids on your castle, and you can view them on the timeline.
Simplified Chinese: 干得漂亮，国王陛下！统治王国不仅需要发展经济，还需要击退敌人。我们得知一群哥布林正计划袭击您的城堡，您可以在时间线上查看详情。
German: Wirklich exzellent, mein König! Bei der Herrschaft über das Königreich geht es nicht nur um Wirtschaftswachstum, sondern auch darum, Euch gegen Feinde zu verteidigen. Wir wissen, dass die Kobolde mehrere Überfälle auf Euer Schloss planen. Auf der Zeitleiste könnt Ihr sie sehen.
Spanish: Stai andando alla grande mio re! La sentenza del regno non riguarda solo la crescita dell'economia, ma anche difendere contro i nemici. Sappiamo che i goblin hanno pianificato incursioni sul tuo castello e puoi vederli sulla sequenza temporale.
Russian: У вас отлично получается, Ваше Величество! Царствовать — это не только развивать экономику, но и защищать королевство от врагов. Мы знаем, что гоблины планируют набеги на ваш замок. Их коварные планы отображаются на временной шкале, в верхней части экрана.

English: You cannot recruit any skilled troops yet, so arm your peasants for now. Construct a Peasant hut and recruit a couple of them. Note that recruitment cost is listed in the building tooltip.
English (reviewed): You cannot recruit any skilled troops yet, so arm your peasants for now. Construct a Peasant Hut and recruit a couple of them. Note that the recruitment cost is listed in the building tooltip.
Simplified Chinese: 目前您还无法招募专业军队，因此请先将您的农民武装起来。建造一座农民小屋，招募一些农民。请注意，招募部队耗费的资源会显示在建筑的提示菜单中。
German: Ihr könnt noch keine erfahrenen Truppen rekrutieren und müsst zunächst Eure Bauern bewaffnen. Baut eine Bauernhütte und rekrutiert ein paar von ihnen. Die Rekrutierungskosten findet Ihr im Gebäudehinweis.
Spanish: Non puoi ancora reclutare truppe abili, quindi armati i tuoi contadini per ora. Costruisci una capanna contadina e recluta un paio di loro. Si noti che il costo di reclutamento e' elencato nel tooltip dell'edificio.
Russian: Пока вы не можете нанимать обученных воинов, так что вооружайте Крестьян. Постройте Хижину и наймите несколько человек. Обратите внимание на всплывающую подсказку, где указана цена найма.

English: Sire, the hut has reached its recruitment limit! If you want to recruit more peasants you need to build a new hut.
English (reviewed): Sire, the hut has reached its recruitment limit! If you want to recruit more peasants, you need to build a new hut.
Simplified Chinese: 陛下，小屋已经达到招募上限！如果您想招募更多农民，需要建造新的小屋。
German: Eure Majestät, die Hütte hat ihr Rekrutierungslimit erreicht! Wenn Ihr mehr Bauern rekrutieren wollt, müsst Ihr eine neue Hütte bauen.
Spanish: Sire, la capanna ha raggiunto il limite di reclutamento! Se vuoi reclutare piu' contadini, devi costruire una nuova capanna.
Russian: Господин, Хижина переполнена! Если вам нужно нанять еще Крестьян, придется построить новую Хижину.

English: Looks like you have reached the troops limit. Having a large army is very important so I recommend you purchase this upgrade as soon as possible! See if you can start producing the resources needed for the upgrade.
English (reviewed): Looks like you have reached the troop limit. Having a large army is very important, so I recommend you purchase this upgrade as soon as possible! See if you can start producing the resources needed for the upgrade.
Simplified Chinese: 您的兵力已达到上限。拥有一支大规模的部队至关重要，建议您立即进行升级，扩大军队规模！您可以检查一下，看看是否可以立即生产升级所需的资源。
German: Ihr habt das Truppenlimit erreicht. Eine ausreichend große Armee ist sehr wichtig, daher empfehle ich Euch, dieses Upgrade so schnell wie möglich zu erwerben! Prüft nun, ob Ihr die Ressourcen produzieren könnt, die Ihr für das Upgrade benötigt.
Spanish: Sembra che tu abbia raggiunto il limite delle truppe. Avere un grande esercito e' molto importante, quindi ti consiglio di acquistare questo aggiornamento il prima possibile! Vedi se puoi iniziare a produrre le risorse necessarie per l'aggiornamento.
Russian: Кажется, вы достигли лимита воинов. Крайне важно держать большую армию, поэтому рекомендую как можно скорее купить улучшение, чтобы увеличить лимит! Взгляните, можете ли вы начать производство ресурсов для покупки улучшения.

English: Sire, most of the troops you can recruit have their own unique Traits which affect the battlefield (or production) in some way. Some troops work exceptionally well together with others.\n\nYou can view the traits of the soldiers you have by hovering over a building, or a unit icon in the barracks.
English (reviewed): Sire, most of the troops you can recruit have their own unique Traits which affect the battlefield (or production) in some way. Some troops work exceptionally well with others.\n\nYou can view the Traits of the soldiers you have by hovering over a building, or a unit icon in the barracks.
Simplified Chinese: 陛下，您能招募的绝大部分部队都拥有各自不同的特性，这些特性会对战场（或生产工作）产生影响。某些部队之间会产生非常强大的协同效果。\n\n您可以将鼠标悬停在建筑上，或悬停在营地中的部队图标上，即可查看士兵的特性。
German: Herr, die meisten Truppen, die Ihr rekrutieren könnt, haben einzigartige Eigenschaften, die sich auf die ein oder andere Weise auf das Schlachtfeld (oder die Produktion) auswirken. Manche Truppen arbeiten außergewöhnlich gut zusammen.\n\nDie Eigenschaften Eurer Soldaten könnt Ihr einsehen, indem Ihr den Mauszeiger über ein Gebäude oder ein Einheitensymbol in der Kaserne bewegt.
Spanish: Sire, la maggior parte delle truppe che puoi reclutare possiede Tratti unici che influenzano il campo di battaglia (o la produzione) in qualche modo. Alcune truppe funzionano eccezionalmente bene insieme ad altre.\n\nPuoi visualizzare i Tratti dei soldati passando il cursore su un edificio o su un'icona dell’unità nella caserma.
Russian: Милорд, у большинства доступных вам воинов есть особенности, влияющие на ход боя (или даже экономику). Некоторые из этих особенностей замечательно сочетаются друг с другом!\n\nЧтобы посмотреть особенности воинов, наведите курсор на постройку или значок юнита в казарме.

English: Your kingdom depends on your supervision. Only the buildings within the area of your gaze will be working.
English (reviewed): Your kingdom depends on your supervision. Only buildings within the area your gaze covers will work.
Simplified Chinese: 您的王国非常依赖您的监督，只有在您凝视范围内的建筑才能正常运转。
German: Das Wohl Eures Königreichs hängt davon ab, wie gut Ihr es überwacht. Nur die Gebäude innerhalb Eures Sichtfelds erfüllen ihre Funktion.
Spanish: La tua supervisione e' fondamentale per il regno. Solo gli edifici all'interno dellâ€™area coperta dal tuo sguardo funzioneranno.
Russian: Королевство не сможет процветать без монаршего надзора. Работать будут только те постройки, на которые обращен ваш взор.

English: You can move and rotate it with both mouse buttons.
English (reviewed): You can move and rotate it using both mouse buttons.
Simplified Chinese: 您可以按下鼠标左右键进行移动、旋转。
German: Ihr könnt es mit den Maustasten verschieben und drehen.
Spanish: Puoi spostarlo e ruotarlo usando entrambi i pulsanti del mouse.
Russian: Вы можете перемещать и поворачивать область обзора кнопками мыши.

English: Strong economies build strong empires. To start off, build a couple of wells: they produce water which is essential for basic production.
English (reviewed): Strong economies build strong empires. To start off, build a couple of wells: they produce water, which is essential for basic production.
Simplified Chinese: 强大的经济是帝国繁荣的基础。首先建造几口水井，水井可以生产淡水，淡水是基本生产的必需品。
German: Starke Volkswirtschaften erschaffen starke Imperien. Baut zunächst einige Brunnen: So gewinnt Ihr Wasser, das für die Grundproduktion unerlässlich ist.
Spanish: Le economie forti costruiscono imperi forti. Per iniziare, costruisci un paio di pozzi: producono acqua, che e' essenziale per la produzione di base.
Russian: Сильная экономика — залог сильной империи. Для начала надо построить пару Колодцев. Они дают воду, без которой не обойтись никакому производству.

English: New Ascension levels are unlocked by defeating the final boss of the run on the previous Ascension level. Beating Ascension for the first time also awards {&1} Ascension Crystals which can be used to strengthen your army and King.
English (reviewed): New Ascension levels can be unlocked by defeating the final boss of the run at the previous Ascension level. Beating an Ascension level for the first time also awards you with {&1} Ascension Crystals, which can be used to strengthen your army and King.
Simplified Chinese: 当您击败当前擢升等级的最终首领后，便可解锁新的擢升等级。当您首次通关某个擢升等级时，您将获得一些{&1}擢升水晶，这些水晶可以用来强化您的军队和国王本身。
German: Ihr könnt neue Aufstiegsstufen freischalten, indem Ihr den Endgegner der vorherigen Aufstiegsstufe besiegt. Wenn Ihr zum ersten Mal eine Aufstiegsstufe meistert, erhaltet Ihr zudem {&1} Aufstiegskristalle, mit denen Ihr Eure Armee und Euren König stärken könnt.
Spanish: I nuovi livelli di minaccia sono sbloccati sconfiggendo il boss finale della corsa al livello precedente. Battando un livello di minaccia per la prima volta anche premi {&1} cristalli di ascensione, che possono essere usati per rafforzare il tuo esercito e re.
Russian: Новые уровни вознесения можно открыть, победив последнего босса на предыдущем уровне вознесения. Пройдя уровень вознесения впервые, вы также получите {&1} кристалла(-ов) вознесения, чтобы усилить свою армию и Короля.

English: These currencies are used to purchase upgrades.\nTown Denarii are awarded through defeating enemy waves. Each 5th and 10th waves award more denarii.\nAscension Crystals can be claimed each time you successfully complete new Ascension.
English (reviewed): These currencies are used to purchase upgrades.\nTown Denarii are gained by defeating enemy waves. Each 5th and 10th wave awards more denarii.\nAscension Crystals can be claimed each time you successfully complete a new Ascension level.
Simplified Chinese: 这些货币可以用来购买升级效果。\n城镇便士可以通过击败敌人波次获得。每当击败5波、10波敌人时，您都会得到更多的便士奖励。\n擢升水晶可以通过完成新的擢升等级获得。
German: Mit diesen Währungen könnt Ihr Upgrades kaufen.\nStadt-Denarii erhaltet Ihr durch das Besiegen feindlicher Wellen. Jede 5. und 10. Welle bringt mehr Denarii ein.\nAufstiegskristalle erhaltet Ihr jedes Mal, wenn Ihr eine neue Aufstiegsstufe abschließt.
Spanish: Queste valute servono per ottenere potenziamenti. Si ottengono sconfiggendo ondate di nemici. Ogni 5 o 10 ondate riceverai ricompense extra.
Russian: Используются для покупки улучшений.\nПолучайте городские динарии, побеждая волны врагов. Каждая 5-я и 10-я волны приносят больше динариев.\nКристаллы вознесения можно получать за каждое первое прохождение уровня вознесения.

Spanish: Citta' denaro e cristalli di ascensione

English (reviewed): Griffins receive bonuses from all troop classes and are counted as all-class. Their cost to produce is increased by {&1}%

English: Each Unicorn increases Spell Damage by {&1}%.
English (reviewed): Each Unicorn increases spell damage dealt by {&1}%.
Simplified Chinese: 每只独角兽可以让法术伤害提高{&1}%。
